price: 4. Waxaana dhab ahaan u yimid warar ku dheehan waano (iyo digniino).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
